headline: Carrier Commits to Planting 5 Million Trees With the Arbor Day Foundation by 2030
summary: Carrier Global Corporation (NYSE: CARR), global leader in intelligent climate and energy solutions, today announced a collaboration with the Arbor Day Foundation, the world's largest tree planting charitable organization, committing to plant 5 million trees by 2030. The initiative, "For the Air We Breathe, For the World We Share," reinforces Carrier's new purpose by supporting nature-based solutions to help conserve energy and reduce heating and cooling costs, all while protecting the health of
